After barely winning the WRC Manufacturers' title in 1983 (beating Audi by 2 points) Lancia introduced the 037 Evo to help defend their title. Even with improved engine power the rear-wheel drive 037 was not able to handle the 4WD competition from Audi (Quattro) & Peugeot (205 T16).
